channel.title: what about the chapters?
channel.description: i don't understand why in the wiki page in the chapters section i click on: [b]xen,Gonarch's Lair,Interloper,Nihilanth[/b] chapters and Written [u]"NOTICE: The developers will not reveal anything related to (the chapter name) until the mod releases"[/u]

item.title: what about the chapters?
item.dc:creator: Conti
item.description:
Because it was written in the time prior the mod release, when developers kept any Xen-related info under wraps.

The text must be adjusted now that the first portion is released. Any ideas?

Anyway, I guess the secret about Xen-related info will continue until the second part release (needs confirmation).

EDIT:

I changed the text in the notices to reflect the new times: “The developers will not reveal anything related to Xen during its development.”

Read full topic
